reviews.review_text: It was an absolute pleasure working with Rob.  Originally, I was hesitant about getting SMP because I have very light thin greying hair.  I met with Rob for a consultation and he put my mind at ease.  He walked me the the process, talked about what his approach would be for my hair and scalp type.  There was absolutely no pressure.  I would highly recommend Rob to anyone looking for SMP.  He has lots of experience and has a take it slow step by step approach so you can make sure that you are happy with the results as you go through the process.  I wanted a subtle natural look and that s exactly what Rob delivered.  Thank you Rob!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: The pleasure was all mine John, absolutely fantastic working with you and getting to know you. So happy you re please with the results, have a fantastic summer and I look forward to seeing you in the fall.

reviews.review_text: I just finished my 3rd session for female density with Rob and could not be happier with the result! I tried various methods for hair loss: laser, micro needling, various hair drops and supplements, but nothing seem to work. I started losing my confidence, and decided it is a time for change! My experience with Rob has been fantastic from initial consultation till our final session. After meeting him, I knew I was in good hands. I saw the gradual increase in my hair density which looks very natural on my pale skin and light hair. I would highly recommend Rob for SMP to achieve the most natural results. Thank you very much Rob for restoring my confidence!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the kind review Elena, it has been a total pleasure working with you. I hope you have an amazing summer and I ll see you in the fall. Take care

reviews.review_text: I contacted Rob in order to help with scar concealment on my scalp. Rob was extremely professional and knowledgeable. I felt comfortable expressing my concerns and that they were validated. I believe Rob to be personally invested in each case and committed to providing the best experience possible. I would certainly recommend Rob to anyone seeking the services he provides.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Nick, absolutely wonderful working with you. Truly look forward to catching up again during your touch up session at sometime in the future. Enjoy the rest of the summer. All the best, Rob

reviews.review_text: Rob is awesome, very professional and overall an excellent SPM legend. He really makes it look 100% natural.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so, so much for the kind review Luis, really means a lot to me. It s been a pleasure getting to know you over the last year. Have a wonderful summer ahead and until next time, take good care.

reviews.review_text: Just finished my last session of SMP with Rob for female hair density and had an amazing experience throughout. During the initial consultation, Rob was extremely patient and was able to answer all my questions that I had regarding the SMP process and was honest about the results that Id be able to expect. The sessions themselves also went very smoothly. I personally found it to be virtually painless and conversations with Rob came super easily. Excited to see the final results once the healing process completes! Thanks again Rob :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the kind review. It was lovely working with you, I hope you have a fantastic summer and I ll see you in the fall. Until then, take good care.

reviews.review_text: I had 2 sessions so far from Rob. His work is amazing. SMP on my head is very detailed and looks natural. I love it so much that I decided to go for a full shaved look rather than a long buzz cut with density. I am super happy with the results. I could not recommend Rob enough for anyone who is thinking about going. Friendly and Professional service all throughout.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Been fantastic working with you Kervin! Thank you very much
